PluginData.Tooltip: Adds single-bounce screen space diffuse global illumination.
PluginData.Description:
Adds single-bounce screen space diffuse global illumination.
This is a gpu-heavy plugin, and you will experience a significant drop in fps when it is enabled. Various parameters can be changed in the plugin settings, including quality presets and GI intensity.
Sampling is based on the SSILVB algorithm with a modified SVGF denoiser for denoising.
